title: Drawing, "Drawing.  Sketch.  Landscape near Jorje, Ecuador.", July 23, 1857
markings:
Recto: Stamped in ink, at lower left: Lugt 457c
Verso: Stamped in ink, at center: Lugt 457d
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite with numbers at various locations; again, at upper right:  2-  Dazzling 3- Grey blue / 4- Bright   5- Mountains Blue; again, at lower right:  Foreground rich in yellow greens & large leaves; and at bottom right:  July 23d / 57
description: Horizontal view of a mountain range, bordered by the banks of a valley with clouds.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Drawing.  Sketch.  Landscape near Jorje, Ecuador.", July 23, 1857.
July 23, 1857. Graphite on cream-colored paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-244.
